metadata.title: CVE-2020-36773 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Artifex Ghostscript before 9.53.0 has an out-of-bounds write anduse-after-free in devices/vector/gdevtxtw.c (for txtwrite) because a singlecharacter code in a PDF document can map to more than one Unicode codepoint (e.g., for a ligature).

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
